e="preserve">Magneto (Max Eisenhardt) (/mæɡˈniːtoʊ/) is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics, commonly in association with the X-Men. He created by writer Stan Lee and artist/co-writer Jack Kirby, the character first appears in "The X-Men" #1 (cover-dated September 1963) as an adversary of the X-Men. Magneto was ranked by IGN as the Greatest Comic Book Villain of All Time.
Portrayals.
He was portrayed by Ian McKellen and Michael Fassbender in movies. He was voiced by Tom Kane and Tony Jay in cartoons and video games.
